s.text: He's never risen to the top ranks of the Senate because he's never been able to behave like a normal senator.

Glenn has spent 36 years protecting the five hours of his life he spent in space, 36 years living up to an impossibly heroic image.
His life proves that in politics virtue can triumph over expediency.

Glenn has spent 36 years protecting the five hours of his life he spent in space, 36 years living up to an impossibly heroic image.
His eloquence, his calm in the face of danger, his small-town-Ohio decency, his boyish freckles--they canonized him.
But if it's easy to be cynical about Glenn's trip, it's nearly impossible to be cynical about the man himself.
But here, too, he may deserve the benefit of the doubt.
